title: I got low priority queue even though I was disconnected because Riot's server issues?
body: I had recently queued up for a game and had trouble connecting, so I restarted my game and got that message saying "oh were sorry were having server issues" or whatever, and I logged in and tried to queue for another. I then got a low priority queue....is this something I did?

replies.body:
I don't see any records of server issues. If you're meaning the message that pops up and mentioned your issues *may have been caused* by the items listed on the [**service status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na), then it was simply showing you what's currently on that page. There's a quick transition bug between champ select and loading that simply requires you to hit the *cancel* and then *reconnect* to get in-game, but this is not a server issue, nor does it affect you after you use the workaround.

If you could provide more detail regarding exactly where you were disconnecting, I'll be able to assist you in troubleshooting the cause of your issues.
Same thing has happened to me. If you get a response please let me know.
